title: Commission Regulation (EEC) No 131/83 of 20 January 1983 amending for the ninth time Regulation (EEC) No 2115/76 laying down detailed rules for the import of wines, grape juice and grape must
header:
COMMISSION  REGULATION (EEC) No 131/83
of 20 January 1983
amending for the ninth time Regulation (EEC) No 2115/76 laying down detailed rules for the import of wines, grape juice and grape must
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN
COMMUNITIES
main_body: The reference to Brazil in Annex IV to Regulation (EEC) No 2115/76 is hereby deleted.

This Regulation shall enter into force on 1 February 1983.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 20 January 1983.
For the Commission
Poul DALSAGER
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 54, 5. 3. 1979, p. 1.
(2) OJ No L 326, 23. 11. 1982, p. 1.
(3) OJ No L 237, 28. 8. 1976, p. 1.
(4) OJ No L 341, 28. 11. 1981, p. 37.
(5) OJ No L 54, 5. 3. 1979, p. 97.
(6) OJ No C 343, 31. 12. 1982, p. 7.
